about_the_game:
For more game information and game feedback, please QQ group: 196787625

Welcome to Revelation, a sandbox-themed survival building game with survival horror and NPC playing elements. In this vast virtual world, you will continue to grow as you explore, build, communicate, and fight, giving orders, forming squads, completing missions, fighting enemies, and crafting items. Based on the sandbox architecture, no matter what kind of game experience you like, here can meet your needs!

Explore and create

In this game, you can freely explore various terrains, discover new resources, collect and process these resources to make various items. You can build your own base, choose a variety of building materials and decorations, and make it the ideal look in your mind.



Battle Growth

In addition to exploration and creation, combat is also an important part of "Revelation". You need to face various dangers, such as enemy attacks, wild animal attacks and so on. Only with the protection of powerful weapons and armor can you survive in this dangerous world.


Simulation management

After you've built your base in Revelation, you can set up shops, sell your wares, and trade and cooperate with NPCs. You can also recruit NPCs and arrange them to do different jobs, such as digging, mining, planting, etc., to make better use of your resources.

Social Interaction

In addition to the single-player mode, the game also provides a rich and colorful social interaction experience. You can give gifts to NPCs, communicate with NPCs, and even plan assassinations. These social interactions not only deepen the relationship between you and the NPC, but also add more drama and fun to the game.

The Heavens and Myriad Worlds (official release)

The map in the game will be randomly generated each time. In this infinite world, you can explore various environments such as jungles, wilderness, mountains, deserts, etc. There are also towering peaks and deep seabeds waiting for you to discover and explore.



Come and join "Revelation", explore the unknown world, build your dream base, challenge the limit of the world, and enjoy the infinite fun of sandbox games!
